participant_1.background:
I wake up early and go for a run to clear my head and start the day off right.
I have a baby monitor in my nursery so I can hear my child when they wake up.
I care about social media enough to stay connected with my friends but not enough to let it take over my life.
I had a birthday party with my family and friends and ate lots of cake, except for the tomatoes.
My heart breaks when I think about the time my dog died.

participant_2.background:
I have no siblings, but I'm hoping to learn some new tricks to teach my dog so we can have more adventures together!
I went to my favorite art museum and bought a print of a comic book cover to celebrate.
i am a huge fan of classical jazz.
I remember my father leaving when I was young, and my mother working long hours to support us.
There are quite a few of us, but we all get along.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Not bad, not bad. How about you?
Pretty good! I just had a birthday party with my family and friends.
Oh that's awesome! How old are you now?
I'm 27 now, how old are you?
I'm 25. I recently went to my favorite art museum and bought a print of a comic book cover to celebrate.
That's awesome! I love comic books. What was the print of?
It was a print of the cover of The Dark Knight Returns. I'm a huge fan of classical jazz. Do you like any classical music?
I do! I love listening to classical music while I work.
That's awesome! What's your favorite piece of classical music?
My favorite piece is probably Beethoven's Moonlight Sonata. It's so beautiful.
That's a great choice! I love that piece too.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go on adventures with my dog. We love to go hiking and camping.
That's awesome! I love going on adventures too.
We're like two peas in a pod!
I guess so! We should hang out sometime!
